name: relationships-notifier
description: Notifications for friend removal, friend request cancel, group removal and server kick/ban.
author: eternal <eternal.git@gmail.com> (https://github.com/localip)

scripts.package: rm -rf packer && mkdir packer && cp -r manifest.json packer/manifest.json && cp -r dist packer/dist && asar pack packer packed.asar && rm -rf packer
